description: Clip this mini-shield to your saddle rails to foil mud and water. The sleek design won't slow your progress on mountain bikes, gravel cruisers or commuter rides.Made of 100% recyclable 0.8 mm thick polypropylene.Clips to saddle rails, no tools required to install.Flip-Tip locks this lightweight fender into place.Designed for tires widths 30 to 50mm.Length is 38cm from tip to tail.
name: Ass Savers Mudguard Big
